name: Wild Magical Creatures (level uy prototype)
description:
Wild Magical Creatures is a real time combat monster taming game in development 

Controls:

player: wasd to move and right mouse button to summon creature 

creature: e to fly , wasd direction , right mouse button to aim ,5 to shoot fireball and 4 to shoot iceball 

To fix errors close and open the game

known errors: the creature beckend dont work 

sometimes you summon duplicated creatures
